short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the recipient email address from 'mailto:' links via right-click context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description: Simplify your email address handling with **linkmail**, a Chrome extension that makes copying email addresses from mailto: links a breeze.

Features:

-  Context Menu Copy: Right-click on any mailto: link to easily copy the recipient's email address to your clipboard without unnecessary interruptions.

- Why You Need It: If you find the automatic launching of your email client cumbersome, linkmail provides a more controlled approach by allowing you to copy email addresses directly from the browser.

Perfect for:

- Customer Support Teams: Quickly collect email addresses without navigating away from your page.

- Sales and Marketing Professionals: Effortlessly copy email addresses for outreach.

- Everyday Users: Enjoy a more streamlined browsing experience.
Installation: Add linkmail to your Chrome browser and start copying email addresses with ease!
